structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Prepayment of fines subject to certain conditions.

text.section: In the event that a prepayable offense is cited with another offense that is not prepayable, a court appearance shall be required on all of the offenses as required by KRS 431.452.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2014). 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 3 provided that the amendments made to this statute in Section 1 of that Act shall be known as the "Denzel Steward Act of 2014."
